name: Item In Stock
response:
<!-- Email Container -->

<div style="max-width: 600px; margin: 0 auto; padding: 20px; font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Arial, sans-serif; color: #333; line-height: 1.5;">

 

 <!-- Header Section with Logo -->

<div style="text-align: center; margin-bottom: 30px;">

   <img src="{{frappe.db.get_single_value("Lifestyle Settings","logo_url")}}" alt="{{ company }} Logo" height="60">

 </div>

 

 <!-- Main Alert Section -->

 <div style="background: linear-gradient(135deg, #991b1f 0%, #c0392b 100%); color: white; text-align: center; padding: 25px; border-radius: 12px; margin-bottom: 30px; box-shadow: 0 4px 12px rgba(153, 27, 31, 0.3);">

   <h1 style="margin: 0 0 10px 0; font-size: 24px; font-weight: bold;">ðŸŽ‰ Great News!</h1>

   <p style="margin: 0; font-size: 16px; opacity: 0.95;">Your requested item is back in stock</p>

 </div>

 

 <!-- Greeting Section -->

 <div style="background-color: #f9f5f5; border-left: 4px solid #991b1f; padding: 15px; margin-bottom: 25px; border-radius: 4px;">

   <p style="font-size: 16px; margin: 0;">Hello there!</p>

 </div>

 

 <p style="margin-bottom: 25px; font-size: 16px;">We know you've been waiting, and we're excited to let you know that the item you requested is now available again!</p>

 

 <!-- Item Information Card -->

 <div style="background-color: #ffffff; border: 2px solid #991b1f; border-radius: 12px; padding: 20px; margin: 25px 0; box-shadow: 0 2px 8px rgba(0,0,0,0.1);">

   <div style="text-align: center;">

     <div style="background-color: #f9f5f5; border-radius: 8px; padding: 15px; margin-bottom: 15px;">

       <h2 style="margin: 0; color: #991b1f; font-size: 18px; font-weight: bold;">{{ item_code }}</h2>

       <p style="margin: 5px 0 0 0; color: #666; font-size: 14px;">Item Code</p>

     </div>

     

     <div style="background-color: #e8f5e8; color: #2d5a2d; padding: 8px 16px; border-radius: 20px; display: inline-block; font-weight: 500; font-size: 14px; margin-bottom: 15px;">

       âœ… Now Available

     </div>

   </div>

 </div>

 

 <!-- Call to Action -->

 <div style="text-align: center; margin: 30px 0;">

   <p style="margin-bottom: 20px; font-size: 16px; color: #555;">Don't wait too long â€“ popular items sell out fast!</p>

   <a href="{{ website_url }}" style="display: inline-block; background-color: #991b1f; color: white; padding: 12px 30px; text-decoration: none; border-radius: 6px; font-weight: bold; font-size: 16px; box-shadow: 0 2px 6px rgba(153, 27, 31, 0.3); transition: all 0.3s ease;">

     Shop Now

   </a>

 </div>

 

 <!-- Additional Information -->

 <div style="background-color: #f9f5f5; border-radius: 8px; padding: 15px; margin: 25px 0; border-left: 4px solid #991b1f;">

   <p style="margin: 0; font-size: 14px; color: #666;">

     <strong>Quick Tip:</strong> Add the item to your cart quickly to secure your purchase. Stock levels are limited and items may sell out again.

   </p>

 </div>

 

 <!-- Support Section -->

 <div style="background-color: #f9f5f5; border-radius: 8px; padding: 15px; margin: 25px 0;">

   <p style="margin: 0; font-size: 14px;">

     Need help finding the item or have questions? Our customer support team is here to assist you.

   </p>

 </div>

 

 <!-- Unsubscribe Note -->

 <div style="margin: 30px 0; padding: 15px; background-color: #fff8dc; border-radius: 6px; border: 1px solid #f0e68c;">

   <p style="margin: 0; font-size: 12px; color: #666; text-align: center;">

     You received this notification because you requested to be notified when this item became available.

     <br>Future notifications for this item have been automatically disabled.

   </p>

 </div>

 

 <!-- Signature -->

 <p style="margin-top: 30px; margin-bottom: 5px;">Happy shopping,</p>

 <p style="margin-top: 0; font-weight: bold; color: #991b1f;">{{ company }} Team</p>

 

 <!-- Footer -->

 <div style="margin-top: 40px; padding-top: 20px; border-top: 1px solid #eee; font-size: 12px; color: #777; text-align: center;">

   <p>© {{ frappe.utils.getdate().year }} {{ company }}. All rights reserved.</p>

 </div>

 

</div>
response_html:
ðŸŽ‰ Great News!

Your requested item is back in stock

Hello there!

We know you've been waiting, and we're excited to let you know that the item you requested is now available again!

{{ item_code }}

âœ… Now Available

Don't wait too long â€“ popular items sell out fast!

Shop Now

Quick Tip: Add the item to your cart quickly to secure your purchase. Stock levels are limited and items may sell out again.

Need help finding the item or have questions? Our customer support team is here to assist you.

You received this notification because you requested to be notified when this item became available.
Future notifications for this item have been automatically disabled.

Happy shopping,

{{ company }} Team

© {{ frappe.utils.getdate().year }} {{ company }}. All rights reserved.
subject: Back in Stock at {{company}} â€” Grab It Before Itâ€™s Gone!

name: Order Cancellation
response:
<p>Hello {{ customer_name or customer }},</p>


<p>Weâ€™ve received your request to cancel order <strong>{{ doc.name }}</strong>. The order has now been successfully cancelled.</p>


<p>If this was a mistake or if you need help placing a new order, feel free to reach out to our support team.</p>



<p>Thank you for visiting us.</p>

<p>Lifestyle</p>
response_html:
Dear {{ customer_name }},

Weâ€™re writing to confirm that your Sales Order placed on {{ transaction_date }} has been successfully cancelled.

Here are the details of the cancelled order:

{% for item in items %} {% endfor %}
Item Quantity Price
{{ item.item_name }} {{ item.qty }} {{ frappe.utils.fmt_money(item.amount, currency=currency) }}
{% if taxes %}

Taxes & Additional Charges:

{% for tax in taxes %} {% endfor %}
Description Amount
{{ tax.description or tax.account_head }} {{ frappe.utils.fmt_money(tax.tax_amount, currency=currency) }}
{% endif %}

Total Cancelled Amount: {{ frappe.utils.fmt_money(rounded_total, currency=currency) }}

If a payment was made, your refund will be processed as per our refund policy.

For any questions or assistance, feel free to contact our support team.

Warm regards,

{{ company }} Team

© {{ frappe.utils.getdate().year }} {{ company }}. All rights reserved.
subject: {{company}}: Your Order Has Been Cancelled!

name: Order Confirmation
response_html:
Dear {{ customer_name }},

Thank you for your order with {{ company }}! We're pleased to confirm your Sales Order placed on {{ transaction_date }}.

Below is a summary of your order:

{% for item in items %} {% endfor %}
Item Quantity Price
{{ item.item_name }} {{ item.qty }} {{ frappe.utils.fmt_money(item.amount, currency=currency) }}
{% if taxes %}

Taxes & Additional Charges:

{% for tax in taxes %} {% endfor %}
Description Amount
{{ tax.description or tax.account_head }} {{ frappe.utils.fmt_money(tax.tax_amount, currency=currency) }}
{% endif %}

Total Amount: {{ frappe.utils.fmt_money(rounded_total, currency=currency) }}

If you have any questions or need further assistance, please don't hesitate to contact our customer support team.

Warm regards,

{{ company }} Team

© {{ frappe.utils.getdate().year }} {{ company }}. All rights reserved.
subject: {{company}}: Your Order Has Been Confirmed!
